about_the_game:
Operating a Chinese noodle restaurant

The gameplay of this game involves running an ordinary noodle restaurant. You will play the role of the restaurant's operator, responsible for all aspects of the restaurant's operation and management, including recruiting staff, arranging tables, promoting the business, setting noodle prices, and more

Strategic gameplay

You need to consider factors such as the economic situation of the noodle shop, the number of staff, and customer preference levels. Based on the actual situation, you should customize strategies. Only by implementing the correct strategies can you better operate the noodle shop. Otherwise, you may incur losses or even go bankrupt

Competitor's gameplay

When the game progresses to a certain stage, competitors will appear to disrupt your operations. You need to outperform your competitors in terms of weekly profits to make them retreat in the face of difficulties, thereby defeating them

After defeating a certain number of competitors, you will reach the end of the game

A collection of authentic noodle dishes

You can learn the preparation of various noodles to enrich your menu. These noodles are mainly from China. Perhaps you have never heard of these noodles, but in the game, information about their origin and other aspects will be introduced. Perhaps while playing the game, you can increase your understanding of noodles from different regions

(Most of the noodle recipes in the game have been personally tasted by the authors who traveled to the local area for tasting)

There is more than one way to make money

Is it better to pursue low profits but high sales volume, or to become an expensive yet exquisite noodle restaurant? Which method can make money? Actually, as long as the operation is reasonable, you can make money. You can completely build a profitable noodle restaurant based on your business philosophy
